root.description: Thorns prick your skin as you push through the deep woods.
root.hint: Geralt: "Jack would just hold me up anyway. Better take the gift and move on."

prop.description: A stream babbles quietly a short way off.
prop.onCheck: The stream has an easy current. It's shallow, but cold.

character.description:
Jack is caught in the thorns. "Ouch! I can't make it any further. Here, @take^ my #torch^. You can @use^ it to light up dark places.
To @take^ the #torch^, type "take torch" and hit ENTER.
character.onCheck: Jack is too weak to make is through the thorns.
character.onTalk: Jack: "I'm going back home. I'll leave it to you to find Joss."

item.description: Jack holds an unlit #torch^ in his outstretched arm.
item.onCheck: This can light up dark places.
